Attribute.AttributeName: Gendarme.Framework.Solution("Add the missing constructor(s) for this exception.")
Gendarme.Framework.Problem("Not all required constructors for an exception type are present in this type.")

Docs.summary: This rule check that any exceptions, i.e. types deriving from System.Exception, provide all the necessary constructors that can be expected from consumer or required by the runtime.
Docs.remarks: This rule is available since Gendarme 2.0
